tool_description: Summarizes text, in almost abstractive way.
name: Text Summarization
title: Text Summarization

api_list.name: Text Summarization
api_list.description: Summarizes a text with paraphrasing. It extracts the essential information and removes redundancies.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-summarization8.p.rapidapi.com/summarize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-summarization8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-summarization8.p.rapidapi.com/summarize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-summarization8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
